resources:
SafeAko PREVIOUS SKIP
//viewpager header Be Aware Quickly Access Self-Assessment
//viewpager description The application will provide animated videos about STIs. The application provides direct contacts to guidance counselor, testing centers admins, and medical doctors. Use the application to seek information if you need a medical or psychological advice.
//welcome login strings Log in Create Account Welcome to SafeAko SafeAko is a mobile app for STI awareness, featuring self-assessment, testing guidance, and counseling support. Phone number Password Remember me! Sign Up I have read and agree to the terms of the User Agreement Verify Otp will expired in 00:00 OTP Code Register Submit OTP
Hello blank fragment Topics STDs Definition Prevention Methods Testing and Medication Contact Facilities Message Center RHU Magsaysay Thank you for trusting us! Now may I know your ....... June 3, 2024 Write message here... No Messages Chat List Update Profile Save Full Name Display Name Occupation Email Address Change Avatar You can select any avatar you want. Select Avatar Admin List No Admins Welcome back! View All Assessment 0 Counseling Testing Just for you! Self Assessment Why are you interested in STI risk assessment? question "Sex" includes oral, vaginal, or anal sex, and a sexual partner is somebody with whom you have oral, vaginal, or anal sex. Select an Avatar Select Municipality Testing and Prevention Method Impact and Awareness Developers Self Assessment Result Attention, User You can contact this facility admin to your confirm appointment. Request an Schedule Update User Guide How to change Password? 1. Tap User Profile
2. Click Profile Setting 
3. Tap change password 
4. Then fill up the form 
5. Click “Save” How to change Phone Number? 1. Tap User Profile
2. Click Profile Setting
3. Tap change phone number
4. Then fill up the form
5. Click “Save” How to change Avatar and Nickname? 1. Tap User Profile
2. Click Profile Setting
3. Tap change “Avatar and Nickname”
4. Then fill up the form
5. Click “Save” How to get counseling and testing schedule? 1. Pre- Assessment button. Place at the middle of inner pane.
2. Check the button for your answer and answer it correctly.
3. Then click submit
4. Then wait for the evaluation and schedule given by Health Facilitator Acknowledgement Main Summary Of Reports Message Positive Negative Gender Relationship STDs Assessment Form All information given will be STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. Please fill out this form COMPLETELY and as honestly as possible. Please CHECK the appropriate boxes. Did your birth mother have HIV when you were born? Forgot Password? Male: Female: Sex with a male/female with no condom Sex with someone whom you know has HIV Paying for sex Injected drugs without doctor's advice Received blood transfusion Occupational exposure (needlestick/sharps) Gotten a tattoo Reason for submitting pre-assessment for counseling and testing Medical History Change Staff Password?
